testcase.system-out: Given User is on register page to signup with invalid anyother field........passed When User clicks SIGN UP button in the Sign Up form by entering numeric values for anyother field and valid values for the remaining fields.passed Then User should see a message Invalid data entered for anyother field......passed

testcase.classname: Register functionality of a Dietician website
testcase.name: Validating the signup form with invalid email id field
testcase.system-out: Given User is on register page to signup with invalid email id field.......passed When User clicks SIGN UP button in the Sign Up form by entering invalid email id and valid values for the remaining fields.passed Then User should see a message Invalid data entered for email id field.....passed

testcase.classname: Register functionality of a Dietician website
testcase.name: Validating the signup form with invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on register page to signup with invalid password field.......passed When User clicks SIGN UP button in the Sign Up form by entering invalid password and valid values for the remaining fields.passed Then User should see a message Invalid data entered forpassword field.......passed

testcase.classname: Register functionality of a Dietician website
testcase.name: Validating the signup form with all fields empty on sign up with email id form
testcase.system-out: Given User is on register page to signup with all fields empty on email sign up form.passed When User clicks SIGN UP button in the Sign Up form by leaving all fields empty on email signup form.passed Then User should see a message cannot be empty..............................passed

testcase.classname: Register functionality of a Dietician website
testcase.name: Validating the signup form with invalid name on sign up with email id form
testcase.system-out: Given User is on register page to signup with invalid name on email sign up form.passed When User clicks SIGN UP button in the Sign Up form by entering invalid name on email signup form.passed Then User should see a message invalid data entered for name................passed

testcase.classname: Register functionality of a Dietician website
testcase.name: Validating the signup form with invalid last name on sign up with email id form
testcase.system-out: Given User is on register page to signup with invalid last name on email sign up form.passed When User clicks SIGN UP button in the Sign Up form by entering invalid last name on email signup form.passed Then User should see a message invalid data entered for last name on email sign up form.passed

testcase.classname: Register functionality of a Dietician website
testcase.name: Validating the signup form with invalid UserName on sign up with email id form
testcase.system-out: Given User is on register page to signup with invalid UserName on email sign up form.passed When User clicks SIGN UP button in the Sign Up form by entering invalid UserName on email signup form.passed Then User should see a message invalid data entered for UserName on email sign up form.passed

testcase.classname: Register functionality of a Dietician website
testcase.name: Validating the signup form with invalid Email Address on sign up with email id form
testcase.system-out: Given User is on register page to signup with invalid Email Address on email sign up form.passed When User clicks SIGN UP button in the Sign Up form by entering invalid Email Address on email signup form.passed Then User should see a message invalid data entered for Email Address on email sign up form.passed

testcase.classname: Register functionality of a Dietician website
testcase.name: Validating the signup form with invalid Password on sign up with email id form
testcase.system-out: Given User is on register page to signup with invalid Password on email sign up form.passed When User clicks SIGN UP button in the Sign Up form by entering invalid Password on email signup form.passed Then User should see a message invalid data entered for Password on email sign up form.passed

testcase.classname: Register functionality of a Dietician website
testcase.name: Validating the signup form with invalid confirm Password on sign up with email id form
testcase.system-out: Given User is on register page to signup with invalid confirm Password on email sign up form.passed When User clicks SIGN UP button in the Sign Up form by entering invalid confirm Password on email signup form.passed Then User should see a message invalid data entered for confirm Password on email sign up form.passed

testcase.classname: View PDF
testcase.name: Validation of View PDF option
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website to validate PDF................passed When User is on View Recent Diets Page......................................passed Then View PDF option is available for the generated diet plans..............passed

testcase.classname: View PDF
testcase.name: Validation of generation of PDF
testcase.system-out: Given User is on view recent diet page to validate PDF......................passed When User selects the View PDF button for a generated diet plan.............passed Then User should see the information in the PDF as Patient details,Doctor details,Patient health details,7-day menu,warnings,Comments.passed

testcase.classname: View PDF
testcase.name: Validation of download PDF option for a diet plan
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website to validate PDF for a diet plan.passed When User selects the view PDF button.......................................passed Then User should be able to see download option for the PDF and able to download the PDF.passed

testcase.classname: feature to test create new Diet plan
testcase.name: Validating the heading
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietition website to validate heading............passed When User lands on Create Plan page to validate heading.....................passed Then User sees the heading Confirm Health Conditions and Generate a new Diet Plan on the page.passed

testcase.classname: feature to test create new Diet plan
testcase.name: Validating the Browse button visibility
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website to browse button viibility.....passed When User lands on Create Plan page to test browse button...................passed Then User should see a button with name Browse on the page..................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test create new Diet plan
testcase.name: Validating the Browse button tool tip option
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website to browse button tool tip option.passed When User lands on Create Plan page to test browse button tool tip option...passed Then User should see a tool tip PDF files only for the Browse button........passed

testcase.classname: feature to test create new Diet plan
testcase.name: Validating the Browse button operation
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Create plan page to test browse button operation.passed When User clicks the Browse button and selects a document...................passed Then User should see the selected document in the field next to the Browse button on the page.passed

testcase.classname: feature to test Login Email on signIn form
testcase.name: Validating the heading on Log in with your email form
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Dietition page to test log in with your email form.........passed When User is on Sign In page to test log in with your email form............passed Then User should see a form with heading Log in with your email form to sign In using email.passed

testcase.classname: feature to test Login Email on signIn form
testcase.name: Validating Login button on Log in with your email form
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Dietition page to test Login button........................passed When User is on Sign In page to test log in button with your email form....passed Then User should see a button with text Log in in the Sign In form..........passed

testcase.classname: feature to test Login Email on signIn form
testcase.name: Validating Sign In with Email and password empty
testcase.system-out: Given User is on sign In page to test Email and password empty..............passed When User clicks Log In button with all fields empty........................passed Then User gets error message Please fill out fields in textbox.............passed

testcase.classname: feature to test Login Email on signIn form
testcase.name: Validating Sign In with invalid email and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on sign In page to test invalid Email and valid password......passed When User clicks Log In button with invalid email and valid password........passed Then User should see message Please fill with valid email id................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test Login Email on signIn form
testcase.name: Validating Sign In with valid email and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on sign In page to test valid Email and invalid password......passed When User clicks Log In button with valid email and invalid password........passed Then User gets a message Invalid Password Pleasetry again...................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test Login Email on signIn form
testcase.name: Validating Sign In with valid email and empty password field
testcase.system-out: Given User is on sign In page to test valid Email and empty password field..passed When User clicks Log In button with valid email and empty password..........passed Then User gets a message Please fill the password...........................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test Login Email on signIn form
testcase.name: Validating Sign In with both invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on sign In page to test invalid Email and password............passed When User clicks Log In with both invalid email and password................passed Then User gets error message message Invalid Login credentials..............passed

testcase.classname: feature to test Login Email on signIn form
testcase.name: Validating Sign In with both valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on sign In page to test valid Email and password..............passed When User clicks Log In with both valid email and password..................passed Then User gets a message logged in successfully and sees signout button.....passed

testcase.classname: feature to test Login Email on signIn form
testcase.name: Validating Sign In with Forgot your password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on sign In page to forgot password............................passed When User clicks on forgot password button..................................passed Then User is redirected to reset password link..............................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test Login Email on signIn form
testcase.name: Validating Sign In with Facebook button
testcase.system-out: Given User is on sign In page to test facebook button.......................passed When User clicks Facebook button to log in..................................passed Then User is redirected to Facebook login Page.............................passed

testcase.classname: Signup using Facebook button
testcase.name: Validating the Sign up process with Facebook
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Register page to signup with facebook......................passed When User clicks Facebook button in the Sign Up with your Email form........passed Then User successfully login with Facebook account..........................passed

testcase.classname: HomePage of the Dietician website
testcase.name: Validating title of homepage
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the browser................................................passed When User opens the Dietician Website.......................................passed Then User should see the public page........................................passed

testcase.classname: HomePage of the Dietician website
testcase.name: Verifying the logo on the Home page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the public page............................................passed When User navigates to this page from any browser...........................passed Then User should see a logo with the company name on the home page..........passed

testcase.classname: HomePage of the Dietician website
testcase.name: Homepage contains few tabs and icons on the menu bar
testcase.system-out: Given User on Homepage......................................................passed When User navigates to the homepage.........................................passed Then User should see a menu bar which contains few tabs along with a search icon, my account icon and a menu bar icon.passed

testcase.name: Validating the title of sign in page
testcase.system-out: Given user is on dietition website to validate sign in page.................passed When user click on icon symbol on sign in page..............................passed Then user should see the title of the page signIn...........................passed

testcase.name: Validating the Sign In page mandatory fields
testcase.system-out: Given user is on dietition website to test mandatory fields on sign in page.passed When user is on sign in page to test mandatory fields......................passed Then User should see all mandatory fields with star symbol on top of those fields in sign in page.passed

testcase.name: Validating the Sign In form heading
testcase.system-out: Given user is on dietition website to test sign In form heading.............passed When user is on sign in page to test sign In form heading...................passed Then User should see a form with heading Sign In form to sign In using Username.passed

testcase.system-out: Given user is on dietition website to test sign In button...................passed When user is on sign in page to test sign In button.........................passed Then User should see a button with text SIGN IN in the Sign In form.........passed

testcase.name: Validating Sign In Process with all fields empty
testcase.system-out: Given user is on sign in page to test with all fields empty.................passed When User clicks Sign In Button in the Sign In form with all fields empty...passed Then User should get error message Please fill out the fields...............passed

testcase.name: Validating Sign In Process with invalid FirstName
testcase.system-out: Given user is on sign In page to test invalid FirstName.....................passed When User clicks Sign In button entering numeric values for Username and valid values for password.passed Then User should get a message Invalid entry for first field................passed

testcase.name: Validating Sign In process with invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given user is on sign in page to test with invalid password.................passed When User clicks Sign In button entering extra length of password...........passed Then User should get a message Invalid entry for password field.............passed

testcase.system-out: Given user is on sign in page to test with username and password............passed When User clicks Sign In button entering invalid values for both fields.....passed Then User should get error message Invalid login credentials................passed

testcase.name: Validating Sign In with Forgot password button
testcase.system-out: Given user is on sign In page to test forgot password button................passed When User clicks on Forgot Password button..................................passed Then User should be directed to Reset password link........................passed

testcase.name: Validating Sign In with Not member Yet button
testcase.system-out: Given user is on sign In page to Not member Yet button......................passed When User clicks on not member yet button...................................passed Then User will land on Register Page on dietition website...................passed

testcase.system-out: Given User is on sign In page to test all fields valid entry................passed When Validating Sign In with all fields valid entry.........................passed Then User logged into sign in page successfully.............................passed
